name: Mercery
description: A shop specializing in fine fabrics, silks, and textiles; adventurers can purchase luxury materials, commission custom garments, or find rare imported fabrics.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the luxurious scent of fine silks and the soft rustle of expensive fabrics. The air carries the promise of elegance and the essential nature of luxury textiles, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of refined taste and the importance of quality materials in fashion.
